title: Then Kizhakku Cheemayile Lyrics Kizhakku Cheemayile
stanzas: <div>Then Kizhakku Cheemayile Lyrics Kizhakku Cheemayile

Then kizhakku cheemaiyila
sengaathu boomiyila
yezha patta saathikoru
eeram irukku.

Kaayapattaa sondhathukku
kanneer vittaa
saayam pola vazhkaiyilum
saaram irukku.

ivuga pozhappukku
neer vaakkathaan
eesaani moolaiyila
megam irukku.

Then kizhakku cheemaiyila
sengaathu boomiyila
yezha patta saathikoru
eeram irukku.

Kaayapattaa sondhathukku
kanneer vittaa
saayam pola vazhkaiyilum
saaram irukku.

Thaai veetu perum
thaai maaman seerum
thekkathi ponnukoru
sothu sugamae

seer kondu vandhum
paer kettu ponaa
sollaama thukkapadum
sondham pandhame

kuththam thaan paathaa
ooril suththamillaiye
kozhikku kunjumela
kovam vallaye
unpola annan indha
ooril illaiye

Then kizhakku cheemaiyila
sengaathu boomiyila
yezha patta saathikoru
eeram irukku.

Kaayapattaa sondhathukku
kanneer vittaa
saayam pola vazhkaiyilum
saaram irukku.

ivuga pozhappukku
neer vaakkathaan
eesaani moolaiyila
megam irukku.

Then kizhakku cheemaiyila
sengaathu boomiyila
yezha patta saathikoru
eeram irukku.

Sengaatu mannum
nam veettu ponnum
kaivittu pogak kandaa
kanneer varume

thangachi kannil
kaneerak kanda
thanmaanam kooda
anna vittu tharume

bandhantha meeripoga
sakthi illaiye
paasatha pangupoda
pattaa illaiye

vaerukku ilagi pochu
vettu paaraiye

Then kizhakku cheemaiyila
sengaathu boomiyila
yezha patta saathikoru
eeram irukku.

Kaayapattaa sondhathukku
kanneer vittaa
saayam pola vazhkaiyilum
saaram irukku.
